p: A(H1N1)pdm09-like viruses have spread to humans in several countries around the world. Infected people then introduced the virus back into pigs, facilitated by the movement of live pigs in trade [ Nelson et al., 2017]. H9N2 AIV infection in large high-density pig herds and a pig farm staff in the Shandong region was similarly reported [ Li et al., 2015]. Nasal swabs collected from 1,029 healthy pigs revealed 8 H1N1-like viruses in China [ Zhao et al., 2012]. Another study of 37,213 pigs in Southern China yielded 387 IAV, with at least 17 unique reassortment genotypes of H1N1-like viruses among them [ Liang et al., 2014].
